# Nigel Creek Bridge Renovation, 93N Roadway Renovation, Banff and Jasper National Park

## Project Overview
Parks Canada is seeking a contractor to complete the necessary renovations to the Nigel Creek Bridge, located in Banff and Jasper National Park. The project involves superstructure repairs and reinforcement, concrete patching, and replacement of joints.

## Project Details
- **Contract Reference Number**: cb-813-58908219
- **Solicitation Number**: 5P468-23-0338/A
- **Publication Date**: April 17, 2024
- **Tender Closing Date**: May 14, 2024 4:00 PM
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: May 21, 2024
- **Expected Contract End Date**: November 30, 2024
- **Estimated Project Value**: Between $1,000,001 and $5,000,000 (Taxes extra)

## Submission Guidelines
Parks Canada has established the following submission guidelines:

- Bids received via fax and email will be accepted as official.
- Bidders must submit their bids via fax or email, as indicated in the solicitation document.
- Bids submitted in-person or via courier will not be accepted.
- The sole acceptable contact email for responses to bid solicitations is [soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca](mailto:soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca). Bids submitted directly to the Contracting Authority or via other email addresses will not be accepted.
- The maximum email file size that Parks Canada can receive is 15 megabytes. Bidders are responsible for any issues related to the transmission or receipt of the emailed bid.

## Important Notes
- National Parks Regulations require that all work be performed in accordance with the ordinances, laws, rules, and regulations set out in the National Park Act.
- Bidders must consult the Government of Canada's tendering service at [http://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities](http://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities) for documents and addenda.
- All inquiries, technical and contractual in nature, must be submitted to the Contracting Authority in writing.

## Contracting Entity Information
- **Contracting Entity**: Parks Canada
- **Contact**: Ken Lacanilao, [kenneth.lacanilao@pc.gc.ca](mailto:kenneth.lacanilao@pc.gc.ca),
